title: Designing Customized Educational Strategies Through Analysis of Perceived Learning Environment Differences

context.prior_knowledge: Basic comprehension of learning environment components
context.additional_context: Analyzing perception gaps between learners and instructors to maximize educational effectiveness, requiring the use of smartphone-based surveys.

learning_goals: Learners can quantitatively analyze differences in perceptions of the learning environment between learners and instructors
Based on survey results, learners can classify learner profiles (Closest match/Intermediate/Distal) and instructor types (Idealistic/Adaptive)
Learners can design customized educational strategies based on types of perceptual differences

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
